mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_favorites (user_id, actor_id, show_id, favor) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{actor_id}, #{show_id}, #{favor})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_favorites WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND actor_id = #{actor_id}

SELECT a.actor_id, a.a_name as actor_name, sc.casting as role, s.title as show_title, t.ticket_date as show_time FROM tb_favorites f JOIN tb_actor a ON f.actor_id = a.actor_id JOIN tb_showcasting sc ON a.actor_id = sc.actor_id JOIN tb_acsch ac ON sc.casting_id = ac.casting_id JOIN tb_ticket t ON ac.ticket_id = t.ticket_id JOIN tb_show s ON t.show_id = s.show_id WHERE f.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY t.ticket_date
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_favorites WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT a.a_name, f.actor_id FROM tb_favorites f JOIN tb_actor a ON f.actor_id = a.actor_id WHERE f.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT a.actor_id, a.a_name, a.photo, a.job, a.recent_work, COUNT(f.favorites_id) AS favorite_count FROM tb_actor a JOIN tb_favorites f ON a.actor_id = f.actor_id GROUP BY a.actor_id, a.a_name, a.photo, a.job, a.recent_work ORDER BY favorite_count DESC, a.a_name ASC LIMIT 5
